# LMS Project Instructions

This is a full-stack Learning Management System (LMS) built with React.js, Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB.

## Tech Stack
- Frontend: React 18, Tailwind CSS, React Router, Axios
- Backend: Node.js, Express.js, Mongoose, MongoDB Atlas
- Authentication: JWT, bcrypt
- Payment: Stripe
- Additional: PDF generation for certificates

## Project Structure
- `/frontend` - React application
- `/backend` - Node.js/Express API server
- Authentication with JWT tokens
- Role-based access (Admin vs Student)
- Payment integration for premium courses
- Certificate generation system
- AI chatbot integration

## Features
- User authentication and authorization
- Course management (Soft Skills, Technical Skills, Analytical Skills)
- Payment processing for premium content
- Assessment and certificate system
- Admin dashboard for course management
- Responsive design with Tailwind CSS
